page.title: 06NEWDIGATE POST OFFICE
page.content: "Beep-Beep"-baker arrives(warm fresh bread).Sweep floor and forecourt,display the vegetables,fetch fresh-cooked hams from kitchen;coffoo brewing,cakes arranged in upstairs coffee-shop. Eight-thirty-instant invasion by penny-clutching schoolchildren.Post Office queue,longer still on pensionsdays,chats cosily.A "rep"arrives,and another;goods too,piled high on trollies,to be unpacked and marked up.Baby-food to batteries,soap to sandpaper,it's all here."bother,forgot to order more butter-will we last out?"
